first_para: Sir Oliver Heald QC, MP (born 15 December 1954) is a British barrister and Conservative politician, who currently serves as Member of Parliament (MP) for North East Hertfordshire.

full.extract: Sir Oliver Heald QC, MP (born 15 December 1954) is a British barrister and Conservative politician, who currently serves as Member of Parliament (MP) for North East Hertfordshire.
full.title: Oliver Heald
